cobblemon.stat.defence.name: Defence
cobblemon.stat.special_defence.name: Special Defence
item.cobblemon.blue_mint_leaf.tooltip: Capable of influencing a Pokémon's defence stat
item.cobblemon.pink_mint_leaf.tooltip: Capable of influencing a Pokémon's special defence stat
cobblemon.species.alcremie-rubycream.des: The moment it evolved, it took on a sweet and tart flavour. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
Craft all seven of the basic coloured Poké Balls
cobblemon.move.aurorabeam.desc: The target is hit with a rainbow-coloured beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.
cobblemon.species.venusaur.desc: There is a large flower on Venusaur's back. The flower is said to take on vivid colours if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower's aroma soothes the emotions of people.
cobblemon.species.charmeleon.desc: Charmeleon mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp claws. If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with a bluish white colour.
cobblemon.species.starmie.desc: Starmie swims through water by spinning its star-shaped body as if it were a propeller on a ship. The core at the center of this Pokémon's body glows in seven colours.
cobblemon.species.hooh.desc: Ho-Oh's feathers glow in seven colours depending on the angle at which they are struck by light. These feathers are said to bring happiness to the bearers. This Pokémon is said to live at the foot of a rainbow.
cobblemon.species.shellos.desc: Its shape and colouration vary, depending on its habitat.
cobblemon.species.vivillon.desc: The patterns on this Pokémon's wings depend on the climate and topography of its habitat. It scatters colourful scales.
cobblemon.species.roselia.desc: On extremely rare occasions, a Roselia is said to appear with its flowers in unusual colours. The thorns on this Pokémon's head contain a vicious poison.
cobblemon.species.kecleon.desc: Kecleon alters its body colouration to blend in with its surroundings, allowing it to sneak up on its prey unnoticed. Then it lashes out with its long, stretchy tongue to instantly ensnare the unsuspecting target.
cobblemon.species.munna.desc: It eats the dreams of people and Pokémon. When it eats a pleasant dream, it expels pink-coloured mist.
cobblemon.species.musharna.desc: The dream mist coming from its forehead changes into many different colours depending on the dream that was eaten.
cobblemon.species.basculin-bluestriped.d: These Pokémon form schools with others of the same colour. The greatest foe of a school of blue Basculin is a school of red Basculin.
cobblemon.species.xerneas.desc: When the horns on its head shine in seven colours, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.
cobblemon.species.minior.desc: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The colour of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
cobblemon.species.minior-indigo.desc: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The colour of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
cobblemon.species.minior-violet.desc: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The colour of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
cobblemon.species.swinub.desc: Swinub roots for food by rubbing its snout against the ground. Its favourite food is a mushroom that grows under the cover of dead grass. This Pokémon occasionally roots out hot springs.
cobblemon.species.fomantis.desc: It loves the sunshine. When it basks in the sunlight regularly, it grows up with vivid colouration.
cobblemon.species.minior-green.desc: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The colour of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
cobblemon.species.graveler.desc: Rocks are Graveler's favourite food. This Pokémon will climb a mountain from the base to the summit, crunchingly feasting on rocks all the while. Upon reaching the peak, it rolls back down to the bottom.
cobblemon.species.minior-blue.desc: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The colour of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
cobblemon.species.ducklett.desc: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favourite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.
Obtain all 6 colours of Nature Mint and gain access to a full array of natures
cobblemon.species.wartortle.desc: Its tail is large and covered with a rich, thick fur. The tail becomes increasingly deeper in colour as Wartortle ages. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this Pokémon's toughness as a battler.
cobblemon.species.weedle.desc: Weedle has an extremely acute sense of smell. It is capable of distinguishing its favourite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes just by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).
cobblemon.species.venomoth.desc: Venomoth is nocturnal—it is a Pokémon that only becomes active at night. Its favourite prey are small insects that gather around streetlights, attracted by the light in the darkness.
cobblemon.species.muk.desc: This Pokémon's favourite food is anything that is repugnantly filthy. In dirty towns where people think nothing of throwing away litter on the streets, Muk are certain to gather.
cobblemon.species.florges-white.desc: A flower garden made by a white-flowered Florges will be beautifully decorated with flowering plants of many different colours.
cobblemon.species.deerling.desc: The turning of the seasons changes the colour and scent of this Pokémon's fur. People use it to mark the seasons.
cobblemon.species.floette-orange.desc: This Pokémon can draw forth the most power when in sync with orange flowers, compared to flowers of other colours.
cobblemon.species.floette-white.desc: Floette that are fond of white flowers can also easily sync with flowers of other colours.
cobblemon.species.xerneas-active.desc: When the horns on its head shine in seven colours, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.
cobblemon.species.gumshoos.desc: Patient by nature, this Pokémon loses control of itself and pounces when it spots its favourite meal—Rattata!
cobblemon.species.minior-orange.desc: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The colour of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
cobblemon.species.minior-yellow.desc: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The colour of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
cobblemon.species.polteageist-antique.de: Trainers Polteageist trusts will be allowed to experience its distinctive flavour and aroma firsthand by sampling just a tiny bit of its tea.
cobblemon.species.alcremie-matchacream.d: The moment it evolved, it took on an aromatic flavour. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
cobblemon.species.alcremie-mintcream.des: The moment it evolved, it took on a refreshing flavour. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
cobblemon.species.alcremie-lemoncream.de: The moment it evolved, it took on a sour flavour. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
cobblemon.species.alcremie-saltedcream.d: The moment it evolved, it took on a salty flavour. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
cobblemon.species.alcremie-rubyswirl.des: The moment it evolved, it took on a mixed flavour. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
The moment it evolved, it took on a bitter flavour. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
The moment it evolved, it took on a complex flavour. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
cobblemon.species.squawkabilly.desc: These Pokémon prefer to live in cities. They form flocks based on the colour of their feathers, and they fight over territory.
cobblemon.species.tatsugiri-droopy.desc: This species' differing colours and patterns are apparently the result of Tatsugiri changing itself to suit the preferences of the prey it lures in.
cobblemon.species.grafaiai.desc: The colour of the poisonous saliva depends on what the Pokémon eats. Grafaiai covers its fingers in its saliva and draws patterns on trees in forests.
cobblemon.species.veluza.desc: When Veluza discards unnecessary flesh, its mind becomes honed and its psychic power increases. The spare flesh has a mild but delicious flavour.
